Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Torquay, Comfort Inn & Suites Arlia Sands is close to Hervey Bay Botanic Garden and Urangan Pier. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Reefworld Aquarium and Hervey Bay Historical Village Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 24 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. LCD televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include microwaves and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), a picnic area, and barbecue grills.

Dining
Continental breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Continental breakfasts are available for a fee.
